secure_access: Secure and reliable access to CIEmpresas.
operation_completed: The operation has been completed successfully.
continue_next_operation: Do you want to continue with the next operation?
verification_code_instruction: Enter the code that was sent to the registered email.
verification_code_error: The verification code entered does not match. Please verify.
company_details_description: Please confirm your company details to continue with your affiliation.
legal_representative_description: Please enter the legal representative's information to continue with the affiliation process
phone_invalid: Phone number must have at least 10 digits
data_mismatch_error: The entered data does not match. Please verify.
change_password_subtitle: We suggest setting a strong password and avoiding using it on other accounts.
change_email_subtitle: Sugerimos establecer una contraseña segura y evitar usarla en otras cuentas.
credential_setup_description: Create a username and password to protect your account and access our services.
user_exists_error: This username already exists. Please create a new one.
passwords_mismatch_error: Passwords do not match. Make sure to enter the same password in both fields.
password_invalid_error: The entered password is not valid. Please try with a different password.
nip_setup_description: Create a PIN that you remember to securely access your account
nip_mismatch_error: The entered data does not match. Please make sure both entries match.
soft_token_activation_description: Enter the code that was sent to the registered email address.
registration_code_error: The registration code entered does not match. Please enter a correct registration code.
affiliation_success_description: From now on, manage all your products in one place.
error_user_password: Incorrect username and/or password, please verify.
recover_password_subtitle: Ingresa tú usuario o numero de celular con el que inicias tu sesión en CIEmpresas
recover_password_recovery_code_subtitle: Ingrese el codigo de recuperación que te enviamos por correo electrónico o mensaje de texto.
recover_password_recovery_new_password_s: Ingrese una nueva contraseña con la que iniciaras tu sesión en CIEmpresas
rules_email:
Must be a valid email:
- Format: user@domain.com
- No spaces
- Use only letters, numbers, dots, or hyphens.
rules_password:
Password rules:
- Max 8 alphanumeric characters
- Cannot reuse recent passwords
- No sequences (abc, 123, zyx)
'- No repeated characters (aa, 11).
successful_change_password: The password has been successfully updated!
successful_change_email: The email has been successfully updated!
token_security_message: This token is for your Digital Banking operations and should not be shared with anyone.
